Html:
Hello, all. I start to use GMap for taxi programm. It's realy cool. But i have some trouble.

I use GMapRoute.Distance property,to get real distance between driver and order. But the route between to points is not real route - it's just straight line. I need a driver path distance. How can i do it? Is it possible to do it using only two points? I use GMap.Net for windows.forms version 1.5.5.5, and google map provider. I work only with Russians map.

Thank you all, sorry for bad english.
